description: Dominic, Brenda, and Toni Talarico grew up working side-by-side in their parents’ restaurant, dreaming that they would one day run a Talarico Food Truck together. Through hard work and determination, they made their dreams come true, and now they’re driving through Denver together dazzling Denverites with a delectable Italian dining experience. Talarico’s Italian Taste is where you find the most delicious traditional Italian cuisine, all thanks to the  tried and true Talarico family recipes. Come eat their perfectly crafted Pizza, Meatball sandwiches, and Pasta, along with their other marvelous menu items. If you’re craving incredible Italian dishes, then wherever this truck is parked is the perfect place to get the perfect Italian Taste.
name: Talarico's Italian Taste
